overview.en: BCP (bitcoin petro) is a new computing network based on bitcoin network bifurcation. It adopts point-to-point transmission and POW consensus mechanism to build a 'decentralized electronic oil circulation system'. BCP aims to become a global general oil ecological value data transmission network.
overview.zh: BCP(BitcoinPetro)是基于比特币网络分叉的一个全新的算力网络，采用点对点传输与POW共识机制，以搭建“去中心化电子石油流通系统”为使命，BCP旨在成为全球通用的石油生态价值数据传输网络。
